==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|む|り|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
{{m|ja|無||lack|sc=Jpan}} + {{m|ja|理||reason|sc=Jpan}}

===Adjectival noun===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|むり}}

# [[impossible]], [[incapable]]
#: {{ja-usex|円を7等分するのは'''無理'''だ。|えん を 7 とうぶん する の は '''むり''' だ。|A circle is '''incapable''' of being divided equally by seven.}}
# [[irrational]], [[unreasonable]], [[unjust]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''無理'''なことを言わないよ。|'''むり''' な こと を いわない よ。|Do not say such an '''irrational''' thing.}}
# [[excessive]]; [[overdone]]; done by [[brute force]]

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|impossible, incapable}} {{ja-r|不可能|ふかのう}}, {{ja-r|至難|しなん}}
* {{sense|irrational}} {{ja-r|不合理|ふごうり}}, {{ja-r|筋違い|すじちがい}}

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|むり}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|むり}}

# [[impossibility]], [[incapability]]
# [[irrationality]]
# something that is [[excessive]]; [[overdoing]] something; doing things by [[brute force]]

===Usage notes===
無理 is emphasised into [[無理矢理]] / [[無理やり]], [[無理無体]], and [[無理押し]].

===Derived terms===

* {{ja-r|linkto=無理矢理|無理矢理に|むりやり に}}, {{ja-r|linkto=無理やり|無理やりに|むりやり に}}: by force
* {{ja-r|無理心中|むりしんじゅう}}
